article.title: Northrop to Support Taiwan E-2C
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Bethpage, New York, is being awarded a $6,924,496 modification to a delivery order placed against a previously issued basic ordering agreement to exercise an option for sustainment, engineering, and technical services, and travel in support of Taiwan Air Force E-2C aircraft under the Foreign Military Sales Program. Work will be performed in Bethpage, New York, and Pingtung Air Force Base, Taiwan, and is expected to be completed in January 2013.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
